title: constant random disconnects from pvp.net
body: ever since i installed the patch, i keep getting random disconnects from pvp.net. an error message pops up at the end of every single game saying "an error has occured. disconnected from pvp.net. a report has been sent." i dont notice it when it happens in game too much except once in a while i'll get what seems like a massive lag spike, and it jumps forward a second or 2. idk if this is happening to others, but its happening. its only when i play league, so its not on my end. i had the same problem a few patches ago...but then riot claimed to fix it in the patch notes. well......its back. its not causing the game to be unplayable like it was before, but im worried it'll get to that point. oh well....hope riot sees this
